org.eclipse.scada.hd.client

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Connection

    public interface Connection
extends Connection
    A client connection to the historical data server
    Since:
    0.14.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListListener(ItemListListener listener)
      Add a new listener to the connection in order to receive item list updates.

      Create a new query on the server

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.scada.core.client.Connection

        addConnectionStateListener, addPrivilegeListener, connect, connect, disconnect, dispose, getConnectionInformation, getPrivileges, getSessionProperties, getState, removeConnectionStateListener, removePrivilegeListener, setCallbackFactory

    • Method Detail

      • createQuery

        Query createQuery(java.lang.String itemId,
                QueryParameters parameters,
                QueryListener listener,
                boolean updateData)
        Create a new query on the server
        Parameters:
        itemId - the historical item to query
        parameters - the initial query parameters
        listener - the listener that will receive data
        updateData - true if the query should provide continuous updates, false if the query should only be executed once an not data updates should be delivered after the query state changed to QueryState.COMPLETE.
        Returns:
        a new query instance, null is never returned

      • addListListener

        void addListListener(ItemListListener listener)
        Add a new listener to the connection in order to receive item list updates.

        A new listener will also receive any already known items.

        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add

      • removeListListener

        void removeListListener(ItemListListener listener)
        Remove a listener from the connection
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove
